hero_subtitle: Experience seamless bus travel with real-time tracking, verified reviews, and value offers inspired by the leading booking flows used by millions across India for confidence and convenience.
how_it_works_subtitle: The flow mirrors familiar patterns: search, select with ratings, live track, and pay digitally for a smooth, trusted booking journey.
step1_description: Enter route, compare options with ratings, and book with digital payments for a fast, reliable experience.
step2_description: Track the bus live and get timely updates for stress-free boarding and accurate ETAs along the route.
step3_description: Use safety tools and share verified feedback to improve transparency and service quality for everyone.
driver_step1_desc: Secure onboarding and identity checks help build trust and accountability within the network.
driver_step2_desc: Follow assigned routes and keep occupancy info updated to reduce uncertainties during boarding.
driver_step3_desc: Periodic location sharing powers passenger tracking and improves operational visibility end-to-end.
features_subtitle: Designed around proven patterns: ratings for quality, live tracking for certainty, and offers that encourage adoption.
feature1_desc: Identity checks and transparent activity help create a safer travel ecosystem passengers can trust.
feature2_desc: Live bus location and updates reduce wait anxiety and improve time-to-board accuracy.
feature3_desc: Built-in escalation and reporting options enhance confidence, especially on crowded corridors.
feature4_desc: Fast, multi-method checkout and confirmations mirror the best-in-class mobile booking experience.
feature5_desc: Ratings and reviews help riders choose reliable operators and premium-quality services.
feature6_desc: Capacity visibility reduces overcrowding and improves boarding decisions during peak hours.
platforms_subtitle: Passenger app, driver app, and admin web unify booking, tracking, verification, and analytics for reliability at scale.
cta_subtitle: Bring trusted search, live tracking, and compelling offers together to deliver a top-tier rider experience across India.
